snippet: The season will include a musical version of “Giant” and new plays by Richard Nelson, Richard Foreman and Colman Domingo.
abstract: The season will include a musical version of “Giant” and new plays by Richard Nelson, Richard Foreman and Colman Domingo.

headline.main: Musical by David Byrne and Fatboy Slim Part of Next Public Theater Season
headline.print_headline: From Edna Ferber to Imelda Marcos at the Public
